pageContext.claim: “We have given you a lot of health care plans that you can choose from through associating health plans. We're giving businesses the greatest ability that they've ever had to join forces to buy much better health insurance for much less money including across state lines.”
pageContext.analysis: Association plans are cheaper because they provide fewer benefits and protections. By definition, they do not provide "better health insurance" though some healthier Americans might prefer to have a skimpier option.
